Package ohos.aafwk.content

Provides classes for basic communication among HarmonyOS applications.

The classes are used for sharing content among HarmonyOS applications, including passing application startup parameters and allowing applications to initiate other applications and return results.

Since:
1
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Operation
    Encapsulates parameters and operations related to Intent.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Intent
    Provides an abstract description of an operation to be performed.
    Intent.OperationBuilder
    Builder class for creating an Operation instance.
    IntentParams
    Stores extra parameter information passed to an Ability.
